meanings.definition: A person who saws wood or other materials.
meanings.sent1: The sawers worked together to cut the logs into smaller pieces.
meanings.sent2: We hired skilled sawers to help us build a new fence.
meanings.sent3: The sawers had a race to see who could cut the fastest!
meanings.sent4: The sawers' blades sliced through the wood like hot knives through butter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sawers at work echoed through the forest.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'sawer', referring to multiple individuals who saw wood or other materials.
meanings.sent1: The sawers in the workshop were busy cutting different types of wood.
meanings.sent2: We needed more sawers to help us finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The sawers gathered around to discuss the best cutting techniques.
meanings.sent4: The sawers' teamwork was as smooth as their cutting skills.
meanings.sent5: The group of sawers showed great precision in their work.
